attributes.action: Intervene to ensure the preservation of Panjabi as a GCSE and A-level subject
attributes.background: We express our deep concern at the decision by AQA to discontinue the offer of Panjabi A Level. Learning Punjabi not only ensures the preservation of Punjabi culture but also helps equip our young people with the language skills they need in the modern world. For more info :- www.panjabialevel.co.uk
